profile:
Green Side Up Contracting Inc. is a professional member of Landscape Ontario & we are an authorized TrexPro - Platinum status!

Over the last 22 years, we have established ourselves within the construction industry as an honest and reputable contractor.  We have earned this reputation by shaping the company around four core values: honesty, transparency, quality of workmanship, backed by above industry-standard warranties!

As the President of Green Side Up Contracting Inc. and a board member of the Toronto Chapter of Landscape Ontario, PROTECTING YOUR INVESTMENT and delivering EXCELLENCE are two of Jay's key priorities.

         ****************************10 YEAR STRUCTURAL WARRANTY - FENCING ****************************

Green Side Up Contracting Inc is a consistent award-winning, construction company that focuses on delivering high-quality workmanship and superior customer service.  We put our trust into our clients with extremely favorable payment terms - pay when the job is completed! We are active members of our community and believe in helping those who are less fortunate.

Services provided include but are not limited to:

-> Fence Construction (80' linear feet minumum)
 
-> Interlocking & Landscape Construction

-> Deck Construction (200 sq foot minumim) 

    - Trex
    - Cedar

***

Not only does Green Side Up Contracting Inc focus on PROTECTING YOUR INVESTMENT by offering a TEN-YEAR structural WARRANTY on fencing, we also believe that doing business together should be simple and transparent.

***

Please use our SELF SERVE CALCULATORS to obtain an INSTANT ESTIMATE for your DECK, FENCE or INTERLOCK project:

FENCE CALCULATOR: https://greensideupcontracting.com/fence-building-calculator/

DECK CALCULATOR: https://greensideupcontracting.com/deck-calculator/

INTERLOCKING CALCULATOR: https://greensideupcontracting.com/interlock-cost-calculator/

***

Please be sure to check our work by visiting:

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/greensideupcontracting/

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCRNuc7PofUOEHCwMf7NdUzQ/videos?view_as=subscriber

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GreenSideUpContracting/

We would also invite you to come on site during the construction process, so you can see our work in progress!

***

Building is fun, business is great, people are terrific and life is wonderful! 

I ask that you put your trust into Green Side Up Contracting - we not disappoint!!

On your side,

Jay Saveall

www.greensideupcontracting.com
service_area:
The maintenance side of our business covers Aurora, Newmarket, and North Richmond Hill. In the winter months we only service Aurora residential & Commercial & Commercial only in Newmarket

Our landscape construction side of our business covers the entire G.T.A.

profile:
Outdoor Lighting Perspectives is the world's largest full-service outdoor lighting company, and we are proud to have our fixtures enjoyed at more than 150,000+ homes across North America. 

Whatever your outdoor lighting needs, we have the experience and expertise to get it done right the first time.

WHAT WE DO:

We want to transform your outdoor living spaces in the best way possible. Some of our exquisite outdoor lighting options include:

-Accent lighting to subtly show off your property’s best features
-Architectural lighting to highlight your home’s unique beauty
-Pool lighting to keep your nightly swims safe
-Patio and deck lights to add excitement to your nighttime entertaining
-Garden lighting to accentuate your stunning landscaping
-Path lighting to guide your guests where they need to go
-Up-lighting for home facade, trees, and outdoor artwork

From a single small garden that needs just a touch of light, to a sprawling estate home that needs lighting with zone control automation, we offer it all.

Call us today for a free at-home consultation, and one of our lighting designers will make a customs lighting design for your unique property.

WHAT MAKES US DIFFERENT:

We are dedicated outdoor lighting designers and installers. We do one thing, and we do it the best. We aren't a sprinkler company or lawn care company moonlighting in outdoor lights when times are slow. We will be here to take the call when your lights need maintenance years down the road.

We manufacture our lights by hand, mostly in the United States but some right here in Toronto, so we can control the entire chain of quality from raw materials to your beautiful garden. 

Our designers, installers, and service crews are all our own staff: we do not use sub-contractors. With Outdoor Lighting Perspectives, your satisfaction is guaranteed in writing and backed by our 30 year on-site warranty.

THE TRUSTWORTHY CHOICE:

How can you find an outdoor lighting contractor you can trust to get the work done right, on time, and safely? 

We have been independently vetted by a third-party for our complete and up-to-date liability insurance and workers compensation coverage, our safety and training compliance, and our long established track record of happy customer referrals and testimonials. 

Companies claiming to do lighting come and go, but we're celebrating 20 years and our warranty is backed by our international network of 60+ locations. We'll install your lights today, but we'll also maintain them for years to come.

THE NEXT STEP:

We offer free design consultations and free quotes. Please contact us to discuss your outdoor lighting needs and how we can be of assistance.

profile:
Willowtree Construction Company's founder Frank Samifanni started undertaking renovation projects as a sole proprietor in 1997. Frank's philosophy in delivering quality work and that has earned him positive and solid reviews and a strong referral base. In 2007 Frank incorporated his company under Willowtree Construction Company and went full force as a General Contractor. 

Presently Willowtree Construction Company undertakes mid size to large size projects from design/ build custom built homes, additions and extensions to the existing structure, complete home renovation including kitchen, bathroom and basement renovations to structural changes . 
As a general Contracting company our trained and licensed trades carry on the work assigned with full professionalism and promptness. We love to deliver turn key projects.

profile: AVL Landscape and design is a family orientated company with over 15 years of experience within the industry. Our number one priority is pleasing our clients and fulfilling their expectations. Our vast knowledge of top-rated products and design allows our staff to cater uniquely to each project. We specialize in custom landscaping, offering personalized cedar decks, interlocking, concrete, water features (such as ponds, waterfalls), outdoor lighting effects, fireplaces and outdoor kitchens. We take great pride in our work and maintain a high standard of excellence in everything we do. We look forward to working on your next outdoor project and promise nothing less than the best.

profile:
Thanks for landing here! Let us tell you a little bit about our crew and how we came to be. 
RTA Landscape and pools started as a side hobby 30+ years ago. The owner, Rei, worked for the largest construction company in Canada since he was 17 and fell in love with the industry immediately. He worked for other large family run companies and dabbled in different areas of construction. However, with a drive for success, extreme work ethic, and precision he chased after a second dream on the side. Rei found a love for landscape and began his journey that has now led him to where he is today; running the most TRUSTED landscape and pool company serving York Region & The GTA.

REI TANAKA
Owner & Operator
- 30+ Years Experience
- Talented Machine Operator
- 3D Structure Studios Expert
name: RTA Landscape & Pools

profile:
Owner of Sunready Landscaping, Jordan Stellinga, was born an entrepreneur and raised a landscaper.

He knew early on that one day, he would fulfill his dreams of running a full service landscape business in his hometown of Stouffville, Ontario.​

Since becoming the proud owner of highly rated Sunready Landscaping, he now works with several other firms to provide top tier exterior services.

The Sunready Landscaping team is ready to help you create extraordinary outcomes. 

We're social here: 
https://www.facebook.com/SunreadyLandscaping/
https://www.instagram.com/sunreadylandscaping/
services:
Landscaping
(Mulch & Decorative Stone installation, shrub trimming, & garden maintenance are just a few of our main landscaping services) 
 

Garden Design & Planting
(Garden design is where we thrive. We create custom designs for your property, taking into account your specific wants and needs.)


Sodding & Lawn Maintenance
(Everybody loves green grass. We know how to keep your grass healthy all year round.)

Holiday Lighting
(We help you to create a customized holiday lighting design. We offer lifetime warranty on your lights along with free bulb replacements and service calls. Installation is safe and efficient with our trained at heights professionals and boom lift.)
